name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its charming soldier button controls and its stylish hand-down arms and legs, Retrotron brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its screen displays a classic snake game, providing endless entertainment for both itself and its companions. To enhance its vision and add a touch of sophistication, Retrotron is equipped with a pair of trendy glasses. With its unique blend of retro aesthetics and modern functionality, Retrotron is ready to impress and entertain with its oscilloscope-inspired charm.
